DataElement.preferredName: Study on Hold Reason Code OnHoldReasonType
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study regarding which the FDA issued an order to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._The code that describes the reason the protocol was put on hold state in the processing workflow.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study regarding which the FDA issued an order to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study regarding which the FDA issued an order to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating that an order has been issued to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

Property.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:To organize and oversee.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
To organize and oversee.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:To organize and oversee.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
To organize and oversee.
